Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
boundedAn alias of constrained for bounded object types (using within_bounds constraint policy)
bounded_intAn alias of bounded with integral compile-time-fixed bounds
broken_constraintClass of exceptions used by error policies for constrained
clipError policy for constrained that clips the new value to the bounds
clippingAn alias of bounded for bounded objects that clip the value to the bounds
clipping_intAn alias of clipping with integral compile-time-fixed bounds
constrainedTemplate of constrained object classes
no_constraintA dummy constraint policy allowing for any value (and thus imposing no constraint)
throw_exceptionError policy for constrained that throws an exception of ExceptionType
unconstrainedAlias for constrained with no_constraint used as the constraint policy
within_boundsClass template for value-within-bounds predicates
wrapError policy for constrained that wraps the new value over the bounds
wrappingAn alias of bounded for bounded objects that wrap the value over the bounds
wrapping_intAn alias of wrapping with integral compile-time-fixed bounds
